title: T20 Scouting Analysis
short: Comprehensive analysis tool for T20 player scouting and performance evaluation
long: Developed a comprehensive scouting analysis system for T20 cricket that evaluates player performance across multiple dimensions including batting consistency, strike rates, bowling effectiveness, and fielding capabilities. The tool helps teams identify emerging talents and optimize squad selection.
screenshotCaptions: Batting Average vs Strike Rate Analysis

title: Win Prediction Model
short: Machine learning model to predict T20 match outcomes
long: Built a predictive model using machine learning algorithms to forecast T20 match outcomes based on team composition, historical performance, and match conditions. The model achieves high accuracy in predicting winners and provides insights into key performance indicators that influence match results.

title: Performance Dashboard
short: Interactive visualization dashboard for cricket player performance
long: Created an interactive dashboard that visualizes cricket player performance metrics across different formats and time periods. The dashboard provides real-time insights into player statistics, trends, and comparative analysis to support data-driven decision making.
